content:
Welcome to #Orders and Observation WG stream.

Description: HL7 Orders and Observations Working Group stream to discuss current trackers on FHIR resources which include Observation, ServiceRequest, DiagnosticReport, Device and more.

I will be posting some gnarly OO trackers here for discussion ( in addition to the ones currently being discussed in the implementers chat). feel free to comment and provide your feedback. Other OO ( Orders and Observations Workgroup ) topics welcome as well
BTW : in this stream OO = Orders and Observation WG , O or Obs = Observation and DR = DiagnosticRequest
